description:
Dodo Pizza is perfect for a quick bite, a cozy family dinner, or a fun get-together with friends. It’s more than just fast food — we create our own recipes, work with trusted suppliers, and maintain quality at every step. So your food is always delicious, and delivery — fast.
CHOOSE AND ENJOY
– Hot pizzas on crispy crust with our signature sauce
– Tasty snacks — from light to hearty
– Delicious desserts for those with a sweet tooth
– Milkshakes and refreshing drinks
– Aromatic coffee for an energy boost
– Hearty breakfasts to start the day right
– Value combos to save


BUILD YOUR OWN PIZZA
– Try two flavors in one pizza
– Add or remove toppings
– Choose crust thickness


JOIN OUR LOYALTY PROGRAM
– Earn dodocoins — our in-app currency — and spend them on products
– Get personalized offers and discounts, including birthday deals


ORDER YOUR WAY
– Fast delivery to your door
– Takeaway when you’re nearby
– Table ordering in-store

TRACK YOUR ORDER
– Watch your pizza being prepared via live camera in the kitchen
– Track your courier on the map in real time

HAVE FUN WHILE YOU WAIT
– Stack pizza boxes in a fun mini-game
– Create your own stickerboard for in-store display


TRAVEL WITH US
Dodo has over 1300 restaurants in 20+ countries — and just one app. No need to reinstall anything when you’re abroad. Menu, delivery, offers, and service — everything works as usual.
Download the app now and order food in just a few taps. We do our best to keep it tasty, fast, and reliable. 
Got questions or suggestions? Reach out at mobile@dodopizza.com

UBEats нь хэрэглэгчдэд эрүүл, амт чанартай, зохистой авах ёстой амин дэм шим тэжээл бүхий хоол, хүнсээр хангахын тулд технологийн дэвшилтэт шийдлийг краудсорсинг ажлын байртай нэгтгэсэн хоол хүргэлтийн үйлчилгээний цогц платформ юм. 

Хоол захиалгын хүргэлтийг түргэн шуурхай, хүртээмжтэй сайтай, өндөр чанартай гүйцэтгэхээр UBCab компанийн 20,000 жолооч, тээврийн хэрэгслээр үйлчлэн ажиллаж байна.

UBEats нь хоол хүргэлтийн үйлчилгээ авах үед тулгардаг маш олон асуудлыг шийдэхээр уламжлалт гал тогооны системийг эвдэн Cloud kitchen буюу үүлэн гал тогооны технологийг нэвтрүүлсэн хамгийн анхны хоол хүргэлтийн платформ юм.

Холбогдох утас: 77051616

Ток Ток бол хотын хамгийн хурдан хоол, хүнс хүргэлтийн апп. Бид Улаанбаатар хотын бүх ресторан, кофе шопуудыг ганцхан апп-д нэгтгэж 1-3 цагийн дотор, хүссэн газарт тань хүргэж байна.

Мөн та “хүслийн хүргэлт”-ээр  хүссэн зүйлээ хүссэн газартаа хүргүүлэх боломжтой. Хялбар захиалга, хамгийн өргөн сонголт, хурдтай хүргэлтийг Ток Ток апп-с

Хялбарт хайлт:

- Нэрээр, төрлөөр, үнээр хүссэн ангиллаараа хайлт хийнэ
- Өөртөө ойрхон байгаа ресторан бүрийг харна
- Бүтээгдэхүүн бүр дэлгэрэнгүй тайлбартай
- Бусад хэрэглэгчдийн үнэлгээ одоор харагдана

Хялбар захиалга:

- Хаягаа хайх хялбархан шийдлүүдтэй
- Нэг товшилтоор бүтээгдэхүүн нэмж, хасна
- Захиалга бүр дээрээ нэмэлт хүсэлт бичих боломжтой
- Рестораны км, хүргэх минут, хүргэлтийн төлбөрөө харна
- Бүх төрлийн банк, цахим төлбөрийн хэрэгслүүдтэй

Хүргэлт бүрээ хянах:

- Хүргэлт хаана явж байгааг шууд харах боломжтой
- Хүргэлтийн дараа захиалгаа  үнэлж, сэтгэгдэл бичнэ
- Өмнөх захиалгын түүх харах болон дахин захиалах
- Урамшууллын код ашиглаж, хөнгөлөлт эдлэх боломжтой

Ток Ток-Тогшилт бүр амттай

FreshPack нь өргөн хэрэглээний бараа, бүтээгдэхүүнийг нэг дор багтаасан, хүргэлтийн хамгийн том дэд бүтэцтэй платформ юм.
Хэрэглэгч танд дараах үйлчилгээнүүдийг санал болгож байна. 
ӨРГӨН СОНГОЛТ
Хүнс, Хоол, Амттан, Мах, Эм, Бөөндье зэрэг ангиллуудын бүтээгдэхүүнийг нэг дороос, өргөн сонголттойгоор захиалах боломжтой. 
БАТАЛГААТ ХҮРГЭЛТ 
Захиалгаа ажил, гэр эсвэл хүссэн хаягтаа шуурхай хүргүүлэн авах боломжтойгоос гадна хэрэв та хүргэлтийн хаяг дээрээ байхгүй бол УБ хот даяар байрлах PP Box-т захиалгаа хүргүүлэн цаг заваа хэмнээрэй. 
ХҮРГЭЛТИЙН ТӨЛӨВӨӨ ХЯНАХ
Таны захиалгыг манай “Shopper”-ууд супермаркет, хүнсний дэлгүүр болон борлуулагч байгууллагуудаас цуглуулан бэлтгэж, хүргэж өгөх болно. Захиалга бэлтгэлийн бүхий л явцыг хянах боломжтой бөгөөд захиалгаа шинэчлэх, өөрчлөлт оруулах боломжийг бид танд олгож байна. Захиалгын талаар асууж, тодруулах зүйл гарвал “Shopper”-той чатлах, утсаар холбогдох боломжтой.

ОРЧИН ҮЕИЙН ХҮН та бидний үзэл баримтлалын үндэс.
Тэд нас хүйс, нийгэмд эзэлж буй байр сууриараа биш хувь хүний хөгжлөөрөө нөхөрлөдөг.

ОРЧИН ҮЕИЙН ХҮН илүү эрүүл хоол хүнс хэрэглэх хэрэгтэй.

Үйлчилгээний хэсгүүд дээр тогооч болон үйлчилгээний ажилтан шууд таны нүдэн дээр тодорхой гарал үүсэл бүхий цэвэр, хадгалах горимд ороогүй материалаар хоол, үйлчилгээг бэлдэж хүргэнэ. Улмаар амьд харьцаа үүсч өөрийн хүсэлд нийцсэн үйлчилгээг харилцан ярилцаж авна.

ОРЧИН ҮЕИЙН ХҮН амар хялбар үйлчилгээг хүсдэг.

Ресторанд орох үед QR код бүхий карт авах ба үйлчилгээний хэсгүүд дээрх электрон меню дээр сонголтоо хийж картаараа баталгаажуулж, хэдэн ч удаа үйлчилгээ авч болох ба зөвхөн гарах үедээ тооцоо хийнэ.

Оюуны өмчөөр баталгаажсан зөвхөн Ариг ресторанд хэрэглэгддэг төлбөр тооцооны шийдэл.

Introducing the ultimate Pizza Hut - Mongolia App – No one outpizzas the Hut! 

With our app, you can easily browse and order from our extensive menu of delicious pizzas, including all your favorite crust options. Our user-friendly interface makes it simple to customize your order to your exact specifications, ensuring that you get the perfect pizza every time. 

But our app isn't just about ordering pizza - it's also packed with great features and functionalities to enhance your overall experience. Here are just a few of the things you can do with our app: 

· Find your nearest store: Our app uses your location to find the nearest store, so you can easily order from the location that's most convenient for you. 

· Get exclusive deals: Our app users get access to exclusive deals and discounts that aren't available anywhere else. Be sure to check the app regularly for the latest offers! 

· Easy re-order: Our app users can repeat their favorite orders with just few simple steps. 

Download the Pizza Hut - Mongolia app today and start enjoying the best pizza experience around!
This application is intended for use in Yuna restaurant and includes activities, which users can view the menu, place orders and receive promotions.

This app is designed for culinary critics who evaluate restaurants, cafés, and gastronomic experiences. It offers tools for creating detailed ratings, keeping tasting journals, and using checklists and timers to measure cooking precision. Users gain access to chef insights, expert articles, and professional tasting techniques. The app also helps track upcoming tastings and culinary events, making evaluations more organized and insightful.

intended for commercial sales.
This app enables you to order cognac, brandy, champagne, whiskey and energy drinks from world known brands of Moet Hennessy, Diageo, BrownForman and Red bull.
“Betastar” Co. Ltd., of MSM Group is a valid entity which operates in accordance with the local and international law that holds a special license.

This application is intended for use in vending machine and includes activities where users can view the menu, receive promotions.
No payment is made.

Энэхүү дэлхийн таашаалд нийцсэн түргэн хоолны сүлжээ ресторан дэлхийн 100 гаруй оронд салбартай бөгөөд Монгол улсад 2015 оны 10 дугаар сард анхны салбараа нээснээр Монголчуудын амтлах мэдрэмж, таашаалд бүрэн нийцсэн дэлхийн стандарт бүхий бүтээгдэхүүнээр үйлчлэн үйл ажиллагааны хүрээгээ улам бүр тэлсээр байна.

- Амтат хоолны жор апп-аар дамжуулан олон төрлийн хоол хийх жор үзэх боломжтой ба жор тус бүр нь орц болон хэрхэн хийх алхамтай учир хоол хийхэд хялбар байх болно. 

- Хялбар ажиллагаа
- Шинээр нэмэгдсэн амтат жорыг цаг алдалгүй үзэх

KFC Ísland
Nú er komin enn betri leið til að uppfylla KFC löngun þína með nýja KFC Iceland appinu. Appið okkar snýst um þægindi og gerir þér kleift að velja hvað þú vilt borða áður en þú ferð í verslanir okkar. Skráðu pöntunina einfaldlega í appið og veldu hvenær þú vilt fá hana afgreidda eftir að þú hefur greitt hana. Þegar þú velur að setja pöntunina í vinnslu þá er hún send beint í eldhúsið. Svo er bara að njóta.

Discover a smoother, more intuitive way to satisfy your KFC cravings with the redesigned KFC Iceland app. Our app is all about convenience, letting you decide what you want to eat before you even enter our stores. Simply place your order through the app and receive a QR code. Upon arrival, scan this code at our in-store machines to bypass the queue. Your order will be sent directly to the kitchen, so all that's left is to anticipate the delicious meal headed your way.

app_name: 美团外卖-外卖订餐,送啥都快
description:

zahii is the ultimate all in one delivery app designed to bring the fastest delivery experience directly to your doorstep.

- It delivers food business is that they can look up prices of foods and other restaurant things
- they can set their location
- delivery man gets money from customer directly not using app
- customer can see his or hers orders.
ТокТок жолоочын аппликейшн нь бүртгэлтэй жолооч нарт зориулан хийгдсэн бөгөөд таньд захиалга авч хэрэглэгчид туслах ухаалаг систем юм.

Тиби хабит нь таны энэ хүртэл дадсан дадлыг өөрчлөхөд зориулсан хоолзүйн үнэ төлбөргүй апп юм. 

Та өөрийн мэдээллээ бөглөн өдөрт уух ёстой ус, авах ёстой илчлэг, байх ёстой жингээ тодорхойлж, хооллолтын зуршлын тест бөглөснөөр чалленжуудад хамрагдана. Чалленжид зөвөлгөө мэдээлэл унших, үйлдэл таск биелүүлэх, чалленжээр зөвлөсөн хоол идэх даалгавартай. Та хоол, усаа хэр сайн бүртгэнэ. Хоол зүйч нар таньд тохирсон зөвлөгөө, дүгнэлтийг хүргэх болно.
 
Та чалленжийн даалгаваруудыг цаг тухай бүрт нь биелүүлснээр оноо цуглуулж, бэлэг авах боломжтой. Хамгийн сайн оролцогч хоол зүйчтэй уулзах бэлгийн эзэн болно. 

Эрүүл мэндийн асуудлын 80% нь буруу хооллолтын дадал зуршлаас үүдэлтэй.
Хооллох дадал хэр сайн байна, эрүүл мэнд тэр хэрээр сайн байдаг нь олон судалгаагаар тогтоогдсон. Тиймээс Тиби хабит нь ирээдүйн эрүүл мэндийг тань сайжруулах, урьдчилан сэргийлэх зорилгоор бүтээгдэв. 

Энэхүү апп нь эрүүл зөв зохистой хооллолтын зөвхөн мэдлэг олгох зорилготой апп тул танд үзүүлж буй аливаа тусламж нь 100 хувь танд тохирсон тусгайлсан зөвлөгөө биш бөгөөд энэхүү апп нь эмч, эмнэлгийн тусламжийг орлохгүй болно. Таньд ямар нэг эрүүл мэндийн асуудал байгаа бол та мэргэжлийн эмч, эмнэлэг рүү хандаарай.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

배달은 배달의민족!

배민이 처음이라면 누구나
첫주문 1만원 할인 쿠폰을 드려요.

■ 입점 가게 수 1위, 음식 리뷰 수 1위
내가 찾던 맛집! 배민엔 다 있어요.
오늘도 배민에서 맛있는 한 끼를 즐겨보세요.

■ 무료배달에 유튜브 프리미엄까지! 배민클럽
최강조합 밥친구 멤버십의 등장
지금 배민클럽+유튜브 프리미엄으로

■ 최소주문금액 없이 무료배달, 배민한그릇
짜장면 딱 한그릇만 시켜도
샌드위치 딱 한 개만 시켜도
최소주문금액 없이 지금 바로 배달됩니다.
혼자 시켜도 부담없는 진짜 1인분, 오직 배민에서 만나보세요.

■ 365일 초신속, 배민B마트
우리 집 냉장고 필수템 계란, 우유, 콩나물부터
맛집 밀키트, 알뜰한 할인 상품까지.
무엇이든 몽땅- 한 시간 안에 가져다 드려요.

■ 마트도 편의점도 삽시간에 당장 배달, 장보기·쇼핑
지금 필요한 건 지금 받아야죠!
1+1 상품도, 특가 할인 상품도
매장과 똑같이 주문할 수 있으니까
우리 동네 마트, 편의점도 이젠 배민하세요!

■ 주문한 음식 직접 찾아오고 싶을 땐, 픽업
배민으로 픽업하면 배달비도, 기다림도 제로!
가까운 맛집 목록 한눈에 확인하고 미리 주문하세요.

■ 너에게 밥을 보낸다, 배민선물하기
소중한 사람에게 따끈한 마음을 전하고 싶다면?
선물하기에서 맛있는 상품권을 전달해 보세요.

■ 많이 살수록 더 저렴하게, 전국특가
생수부터 라면, 샴푸, 휴지까지, 미리 사두면 든든하니까.
매일이 특가인 배민에서 가볍게 주문하세요.

■ 실시간 위치 확인으로 더 정확하게!
내 주문 어디까지 왔나? 궁금할 땐
배달 현황에서 라이더 위치를 확인해 보세요.

※ 배민배달, 배민클럽, 배민한그릇, 장보기·쇼핑, 배민B마트 등 일부 서비스는 현재 일부 지역에서 만날 수 있어요.

[App Permissions] 
Pursuant to Article 22(2) of the Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection, Coupang Eats obtains consent to ‘App Permissions’ from users for the following purposes. The delivery app Coupang Eats selectively requests access permissions for the items required to provide its services only, as listed below. 
Location Services: Allows Coupang Eats to access your current location to display your address and provide real-time updates on delivery status for your food
Notifications: Allows Coupang Eats to send app push notifications
Camera: Accesses your camera when you write a review or scan a card for payment method registration
Photos: Accesses your phone gallery when you write a review on delivered food or upload saved photos for payment method registration
Storage: Authorizes library installation when scanning a card
* You can continue to use the app without granting consent to the optional access permissions

Tired of cooking the same 3 meals on repeat? Zest integrates a mind-blowing cooking education into your routine. Learn to cook with us through step-by-step explanations of foundational cooking concepts in fewer than 10 minutes and dishes that bring the concept to life. Our recipes are created by two former Michelin star chefs, distilled by a home chef, and cooked by you, the superstar home cook that you are (or will be). We don't assume any prior culinary knowledge. We meet you where you are and help you improve.
 
Stop copying traditional recipes - start learning from Zest. We've cooked those delicious Bon Appetit dinners. But when we took away the recipes we felt like lost puppies. Zest is designed to teach you the how's and why's of cooking. So when the recipe is gone you can confidently navigate the kitchen. The promise: Taste improvement after one dinner with Zest.

FEATURES:

STEP-BY-STEP INSTRUCTIONS
We've all tried cooking a TikTok recipe. You rewatch the video 13 times to figure out what the hell is going on. Zest embeds videos throughout recipes so you can click into content when you need it. No more pausing and restarting. Learn at your own pace.
 
CONCEPT VIDEOS
Watch a short video on a new concept at your own pace and then cook recipes that reinforce what you've learned. We dive into topics like the science of tasting and the basics of seasoning, sautéing, roasting and more!

SKILL VIDEOS
Don't know how to dice an onion? Don't be embarrassed, we got you covered. Skill videos are linked in each recipe to guide you along, so you don't have to watch Gordon Ramsey on YouTube (we love his accent too).

CURATED MENU
Choose a menu to fit your preferences. Tired of wasting produce? Search for dishes including what’s already in your fridge. Got allergies? Compile safe recipes in your menu to find them when you’re ready to get cooking. 

GROCERY LIST
Shop your menu with our automated grocery list. Plus, utilize our helpful tips while you shop. Don't know what a neutral oil is? We got you covered.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS
Rate the recipes you cook, so we can recommend similar ones.

Feedback? Technical Issues? Killer ideas you want to contribute to make our app better? Email us at support@zestapp.co. We're always here to help and would love to chef up new ideas together!

Welcome to Karrot, the future of grocery shopping! Karrot is a specialized grocery app designed to provide quick and convenient access to groceries from the nearest stores around you. Whether you're at home, in the office, or anywhere else, Karrot ensures you can order your grocery essentials anytime, anywhere.
Key Features:
1. Radius Zone Areas:
First Zone: Enjoy the lowest delivery fees of just 0.250 KD.
Second Zone: Moderate delivery fees for slightly farther locations.
Third Zone: Maximum delivery fees for the farthest delivery areas.
This unique feature ensures you get your groceries at the best possible delivery rates based on your location.
2. Lightning-Fast Delivery:
Get your orders delivered within just 5 minutes! Karrot's efficient delivery system ensures you never have to wait long for your groceries.
3. Live Store Viewing:
View grocery stores around your location live on Google Maps. This feature allows you to see the variety of stores available and choose the one that best meets your needs.
4. Wide Variety of Products:
Fresh Vegetables and Fruits: Delivered daily to ensure you get the freshest produce.
Dairy Products: Fresh dairy items available every day.
Snacks and More: Get your favorite snacks from the nearest grocery store in no time.
Household Essentials: From cleaning supplies to personal care items, find everything you need for your home.
Beverages: A wide selection of drinks, including juices, sodas, and more.
5. Convenience at Your Fingertips:
Karrot brings convenience to your doorstep. With just a tap, you can have all your grocery needs met in one place. From cart to your door in no time, Karrot makes grocery shopping effortless.
6. User-Friendly Interface:
The app is designed to be intuitive and easy to use, making your shopping experience smooth and enjoyable. Easily browse through categories, add items to your cart, and check out with just a few taps.
7. Order Tracking:
Track your order in real-time from the moment you place it until it arrives at your doorstep. Stay updated with notifications and know exactly when to expect your delivery.
8. Secure Payments:
Multiple payment options including credit/debit cards, mobile wallets. Your transactions are secure and hassle-free.
Why Choose Karrot?
Local Favorites, Closer Than Ever: Karrot connects you with local grocery stores, ensuring you get the best products from your favorite stores.
Reliable and Efficient: With Karrot, you can trust that your groceries will be delivered quickly and efficiently, every time.
Exclusive Offers and Discounts: Enjoy special deals and discounts available only to Karrot users. Save more on your grocery shopping with our exclusive offers.
About Karrot:
Karrot is a Kuwait-based grocery app dedicated to providing quick and convenient access to groceries from nearby stores. Our mission is to make grocery shopping as easy and efficient as possible, ensuring you have everything you need at your fingertips. With Karrot, you can enjoy a seamless shopping experience, from browsing to delivery.
